00049 // Flags used in command handling.
00050 
00051 // These flags represent the majority of the states that affect
00052 // whether or not items in menus are enabled or disabled.
00053 enum 
00054 {
00055    AlwaysEnabledFlag      = 0x00000000,
00056 
00057    AudioIONotBusyFlag     = 0x00000001,
00058    TimeSelectedFlag       = 0x00000002, // This is equivalent to check if there is a valid selection, so it's used for Zoom to Selection too 
00059    TracksSelectedFlag     = 0x00000004,
00060    TracksExistFlag        = 0x00000008,
00061    LabelTracksExistFlag   = 0x00000010,
00062    WaveTracksSelectedFlag = 0x00000020,
00063    ClipboardFlag          = 0x00000040,
00064    TextClipFlag           = 0x00000040, // Same as Clipboard flag for now.
00065    UnsavedChangesFlag     = 0x00000080,
00066    HasLastEffectFlag      = 0x00000100,
00067    UndoAvailableFlag      = 0x00000200,
00068    RedoAvailableFlag      = 0x00000400,
00069    ZoomInAvailableFlag    = 0x00000800,
00070    ZoomOutAvailableFlag   = 0x00001000,
00071    StereoRequiredFlag     = 0x00002000,  //lda
00072    TopDockHasFocus        = 0x00004000,  //lll
00073    TrackPanelHasFocus     = 0x00008000,  //lll
00074    BotDockHasFocus        = 0x00010000,  //lll
00075    LabelsSelectedFlag     = 0x00020000,
00076    AudioIOBusyFlag        = 0x00040000,  //lll
00077    PlayRegionLockedFlag   = 0x00080000,  //msmeyer
00078    PlayRegionNotLockedFlag= 0x00100000,  //msmeyer
00079    CutCopyAvailableFlag   = 0x00200000,
00080    WaveTracksExistFlag    = 0x00400000,
00081    NoteTracksExistFlag    = 0x00800000,  //gsw
00082    NoteTracksSelectedFlag = 0x01000000,  //gsw
00083    HaveRecentFiles        = 0x02000000,
00084    LinkingDisabledFlag    = 0x04000000,  //awd
00085 
00086    NoFlagsSpecifed        = 0xffffffff
00087 };
